name: Heat vision
description: Allows the user to shoot concentrated heat beams out of his eyes

name: Super strength
description: Allows the user to lift heavy objects

name: Green Lantern Ring
description: Allows the user control energy with the ring, to create weapons or energy blasts

name: Money
description: A LOT of money, like, a lot

name: Unstable Invisibility
description: User is invisible, but only when they sneeze

name: Partial Teleportation
description: User can teleport to any location they can see, but their clothes don't teleport with them

name: Laxant Power Copy
description: User can copy any power they see for 2 days, but they get sudden onset violent diarrhea for a week

name: Blind Mind Reading
description: Ability to read people's minds, but only in braille

name: Time Stop
description: User can stop time for up to one hour, but only their mind works, they can't move

name: Super Intelligence
description: User has insane levels of intelligence

name: Unstable Flight
description: User can fly only on Tuesdays, for 3 minutes after drinking a Red Bull

name: Partial flight
description: User can fly for 3 seconds with a 3 second cooldown

name: Total Invisibility
description: User can become invisible, but becomes blind whenever they do

name: Super Speed
description: User can move at incredible speeds, but only when they are naked
